name: Mutual Lock
Mutual Lock stop
Mutual Lock stop
function 1
Get Verbrauch
Get Füllstanddaten
Get Zähler
func:
msg.query=`from(bucket: "steinerapp")
  |> range(start: -1m, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "steinerMessung")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "zaehlerstand")`
return msg;

name: Get Füllstand
func:
msg.query=`from(bucket: "steinerapp")
  |> range(start: -1m, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "steinerMessung")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "fuellstand")`
return msg;

name: Get Verbrauch
Get Zähler
func:
msg.query=`from(bucket: "steinerapp")
  |> range(start: -1h, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "steinerMessung")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "zaehlerstand")`
return msg;

name: Get Füllstand
func:
msg.query=`from(bucket: "steinerapp")
  |> range(start: -1h, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "steinerMessung")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "fuellstand")`
return msg;

name: Get Zählerdaten
Get Verbrauchdaten
function 2
func:
msg.topic = `CREATE TABLE steinerMessungen (
    verbrauch varchar(255),
    zaehler varchar(255),
    fuellstand varchar(255),
    Datum TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
    );`
return msg;

name: function 3
SELECT verbrauch
func:
msg.topic = 'SELECT verbrauch FROM steinerMessungen'
return msg;

name: SELECT LAST
func:
msg.topic = 'SELECT * FROM steinerMessungen ORDER BY datum DESC LIMIT 1;'
return msg;

name: SELECT * Month
func:
msg.topic = `SELECT * FROM steinerMessungen 
            WHERE MONTH(Datum) = MONTH(now()) AND
            YEAR(Datum) = YEAR(now());`
return msg;
